title: Analyze Data
description: Analyze datasets, generate visualizations, and produce statistical summaries using AI-powered data analysis
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: analyze
commands.description: Analyze a dataset and answer specific questions about it

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Dataset as CSV string, JSON array, or URL to a data file

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The analytical question to answer about the data

returns.description: Analysis result with answer, supporting statistics, methodology used, confidence level, and caveats

commands.name: visualize
commands.description: Generate a chart or visualization from data

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Dataset as CSV string, JSON array, or URL to a data file

returns.description: Visualization object with chart config (Vega-Lite spec), rendered image URL, and data insights

commands.name: summarize_dataset
commands.description: Generate a comprehensive statistical summary of a dataset

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Dataset as CSV string, JSON array, or URL to a data file

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: Specific columns to analyze (defaults to all)

returns.description: Summary with column types, descriptive statistics, distributions, correlations, missing values, outliers, and key observations
